Metadata.title: LexiVocab - Learn Vocabulary While Browsing
Metadata.description: Chrome extension that helps you translate, save, and review English vocabulary naturally while browsing the web. Master vocabulary one click at a time.
Metadata.keywords: vocabulary learning, learn english, chrome extension, vocabulary builder, language learning, flashcards, word translator, contextual translation

Hero.title: Learn vocabulary passively while <highlight>browsing the web</highlight>
Hero.subtitle: Don't let dictionary lookups interrupt your reading flow. LexiVocab helps you translate, save, and review English vocabulary naturally.

Features.title: Everything you need to learn vocabulary effectively
Features.subtitle: LexiVocab is designed to help you build your vocabulary without changing your browsing habits.
Features.smart_bubble_desc: Highlight any text to translate quickly. Save words with just one click without opening a new tab.
Features.context_trans_desc: AI automatically analyzes sentences to provide the most accurate meaning and saves with example sentences.
Features.highlight_desc: Encounter a saved word again? We'll highlight it to remind you to review immediately.
Features.dashboard_desc: Manage your personal vocabulary, practice pronunciation, and track learning progress.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro_desc: Welcome to LexiVocab. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you use our Chrome extension and website.
Privacy.data_desc: LexiVocab collects minimal data to provide you with the best vocabulary learning experience:
Privacy.data_vocab: Vocabulary Data: The words you save, translations, and context sentences. This data is stored locally on your device.
Privacy.data_settings: Settings: Your preferences such as highlight colors and language settings.
Privacy.data_analytics: Usage Analytics: Anonymous usage statistics to improve our service (optional).
Privacy.usage_provide: To provide and maintain our service
Privacy.usage_improve: To improve and personalize your experience
Privacy.usage_understand: To understand how users interact with our extension
Privacy.storage_desc: All your vocabulary data is stored locally on your device using Chrome's Storage API. We do not upload your personal vocabulary data to any external servers.
Privacy.third_party_desc: We may use third-party translation APIs to provide contextual translations. These services only receive the text you choose to translate and do not have access to your personal information or saved vocabulary.
Privacy.rights_desc: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time through the extension settings. You can also export your vocabulary data or clear all saved data.
Privacy.contact_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.acceptance_desc: By installing and using the LexiVocab Chrome Extension, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
Terms.description_desc: LexiVocab is a Chrome browser extension designed to help users learn vocabulary while browsing. Features include text translation, vocabulary saving, word highlighting, and vocabulary management.
Terms.resp_personal: Use the extension only for personal, non-commercial purposes
Terms.resp_reverse: Do not attempt to reverse engineer or modify the extension
Terms.resp_illegal: Do not use the extension for any illegal activities
Terms.resp_copyright: Respect copyright when saving content from websites
Terms.ip_desc: LexiVocab and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Phan Van Thanh and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
Terms.disclaimer_desc: The extension is provided "as is" without any warranty. We do not guarantee the accuracy of translations or that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free.
Terms.liability_desc: In no event shall LexiVocab or its developers be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages arising out of your use of the extension.
Terms.changes_desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes through the extension or our website.
Terms.contact_desc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at:

HowItWorks.title: Get started in 3 simple steps
HowItWorks.subtitle: It takes less than 1 minute to install and start learning new vocabulary.
HowItWorks.step1_desc: Install LexiVocab from the Chrome Web Store for free.
HowItWorks.step2_desc: Highlight any word you want to lookup while reading articles or news.
HowItWorks.step3_desc: Save vocabulary to your personal collection and get reminded to review at the right time.

reasons.buggy: It's buggy or not working correctly
reasons.not_useful: I don't find it useful anymore

Uninstall.comment_placeholder: Please tell us more about how we can improve... (Optional)

Feedback.title: Feedback & Support
Feedback.subtitle: Have a bug to report or a feature to request? We'd love to hear from you!
Feedback.message_placeholder: Describe the issue or idea in detail...
Feedback.upload_placeholder: Click or drag image to upload
Feedback.success_desc: Thank you for helping us improve LexiVocab. We've received your feedback.

Welcome.demo_description: Highlight the word "serendipity" below to see how LexiVocab helps you save and learn new vocabulary.
Welcome.demo_text_2: ‚Äî those happy accidents when you encounter the perfect word at the right moment.
Welcome.demo_text_3: The best way to expand your vocabulary is through natural exposure. Reading articles, news, and content in your target language helps you understand words in context, making them easier to remember.

Changelog.title: Changelog
Changelog.subtitle: Track the latest updates and improvements to LexiVocab
Changelog.mode_toggle_feature: Mode Toggle: Quickly switch between Standard Mode and Compact Mode
Changelog.realtime_input_translation: Real-time Input Translation: Translate text while typing by pressing Space 3 times
Changelog.highlight_performance_optimization: Improved highlight performance for vocabulary words

VideoDemo.title: See LexiVocab in Action
VideoDemo.subtitle: Discover how LexiVocab helps you learn vocabulary naturally and efficiently while browsing the web
